title: Palindrome Champ Sees The World Backwards And Forwards
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel talks to Mark Saltveit who is featured in a short documentary about the World Palindrome Championships, A Man, A Plan, A Palindrome. He will compete in the 2017 championship.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
